title: [BUG] Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies on windows server 2012 R2
body:
### Description

Hello, i build and deploy a .net9.0 app with skiasharp as a dependencies. 
recently i upgraded the version from 3.116 to 3.119

But i notice in one of my client ,which have an old windows server 2012 R2, the app crash when the library is used with the error "DllNotFoundException Unable to load DLL 'libSkiaSharp' or one of its dependencies "

If i regress to 3.116 everything work again

I dont' have this problem with other clients on more recent windows server

Does the last version is officialy compatible with windows server 2012 R2 ?

Thanks !
